summary:
Based on the video guide by Labcloning http://www.youtube.com/user/Labcloning. To make as accurate a representation of The Chuck.  Done with the in game face gen. 

You will need an alternate start for this to work.  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557

Ignore the some of the content might be missing yada, yada just play.
descriptionHtml:
Didn\'t see any saved files using this man\'s guide, thought it was pretty good. Made a save file so  u don\'t have the hassle of making it. Change name using console. 

Based on the video guide by Labcloning http://www.youtube.com/user/Labcloning. To make as accurate a representation of The Chuck.  Done with the in game face gen. 

You will need an alternate start for this to work.  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557

Ignore the some of the content might be missing yada, yada just play.
author: glassoid
